name: Easy Social Photos Gallery – MIF
author: Sajid Javed

sections.description:
Formerly “My Instagram Feed – Instagram Photos Gallery” display photos and videos from a non-private Instagram account in a responsive, mobile friendly and customizable layout on your website.

My Instagram Feed and Photos Gallery is a modern plugin with a beginner’s friendly workflow to list your stunning Instagram photos from Instagram on your site in a minute. Yes, one minute (or less)!

FEATURES:

  1. One minute setup.
  2. Fully customizable. Customize the layout and look & feel using the WP Customizer in real time. Yes, no more guessing!
  3. Change number of columns, colors and borders.
  4. Create multiple skins. Really handy when you need to display feed in the page as well as in the footer or sidebar, differently.
  5. Completely responsive and mobile friendly.
  6. Powerful shortcode generator, you don‚Äôt need to mess up with shortcode attributes.
  7. Load more button to display unlimited photos.
  8. Follow on Instagram button.
  9. Display header at the top of the feed.
  10. Much More Awesome Stuff To Come…

Want to see it in action?

Check out the Insntagram Feed and Instagram Photos Gallery demo here ->Demo

How to use the plugin

You can use My Instagram Feed plugin to display Instagram photos in a page, post or any custom post type, in the sidebar/footer, and even call it directly in a PHP file.

After installing and activation, click on the ‘My Instagram Feed’ settings page to connect your Instagram account with your site by using the workflow.

My Instagram Feed Shortcode:

Copy [my-instagram-feed] shortcode (or Generate it from My Instagram Feed page according to your requirements) and add into any page, post or any other shortcode aware area and let it handle the rest.

My Instagram Widget:

Yes, you can display your stunning Instagram photos in the sidebar/footer by adding the shortcode in a text widget. Copy the shortcode and go to Appearance -> Customize -> Widgets -> Sidebar (or any other location) -> Add a widget -> search for text -> Paste the shortcode in text area, save the changes and voila! (Yes, you can add directly in any widget from Appearance -> Widgets too üòâ )

Template tag:

Last but not least, you can call in the shortcode directly in a PHP template by using this piece of code <?php echo do_shortcode(‚Äú[my-instagram-feed]‚Äù); ?> and let it be in the place you want.

WANT TO CUSTOMIZE?

Sure you can. Go to WP Admin -> MIF -> Skin -> Edit and make the changes in real time.

NEED HELP?

Yes, we stand firmly behind our plugins. Create a support ticket:
Support

NOTE

My Instagram feed is absolutely the simplest, most beginner friendly yet powerful and the only plugin with one-minute setup (or even less).

Also, I‚Äôm the author of Easy Facebook Likebox (the easiest to use plugin with 5-star rating and over 100,000+ active installs) and Floating Links (simplest plugin ever with 5-star rating).

Thank you

Danish Ali Malik
sections.changelog:
3.1.1

  • Updated: Freemius SDK
  • Fixed: Minor issues

3.0.0

  • Added: New Instagram Layouts
  • Fixed: Minor issues

2.0.0

  • Removed: Deperecated Instagram API
  • Added: New Instagram API
  • Added: Ability to display Personal and Business Instagram accounts feed.

1.3.0

  • Moving notice to Easy Social Post Feed.

1.2.0

  • Changed name from My Instagram Feed to Easy Social Photos Gallery to remove their WORDMARK.
  • Security fix.
  • Compatibility with WordPress latest version.

1.1.0

  • Security fix.
  • Minor fixes.
  • Compatibility with WordPress latest version.

1.0.0

  • Initial release.
